configurableConfig.description: When configured, passed-in paths are ignored.
configurableConfig.label: Path

script:
if [[ -n "${target_path}" ]]; then
  ../.common/finder-comment set "${finder_comment}" "${target_path}"
elif [[ "${#}" -gt 0 ]]; then
  ../.common/finder-comment set "${finder_comment}" "${@}"
else
  echo 'Either a valid input or configuration is required' >&2
  exit 1
fi
taskDescription: Sets the Finder comment of the passed-in path
